author: Staff Reporter
text:
Owners of nearly 1,200 job-working power loom units at Pallagoundenpalayam and nearby areas, who are involved in production of towels, have decided to continue exerting pressure for upward revision of job work charges once the elections are over.

The units have been running on thin profits and pressure from the labourers for higher wages was much these days.
title: Power loom units to continue demand for hike in wages
